markdownRemark.html: Welcome to part one of Getting Started with Ecto. This post is part of a series of blog posts to teach you how to use Ecto. I will cover the basics and some of the advance features of Ecto. By the end of the series, you will be able to conformatable use it in your Elixir applications.

frontmatter.title: Custom URLs in Gatsby Blog Posts
